snippet: Billions of dollars are at stake for insurance companies processing claims in the wake of Hurricane Sandy, so policyholders should be wary until their own big check clears.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column says that with billions of dollars at stake for insurance companies processing claims in the wake of Hurricane Sandy,  policyholders should be wary until their own big check clears.
lead_paragraph: Billions of dollars are at stake for insurance companies processing claims in the wake of Hurricane Sandy, so policyholders should be wary until their own big check clears.

headline.seo: After the Storm: Managing Your Homeowner’s Claim
headline.main: After the Storm: Your Homeowner’s Claim
